frameDefinitions: A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.
An Agent acts to ensure that a Rule (often a constraint on behavior) is being followed.
A Phenomenon is related to some cognitive action, the Endeavor, of a Cognizer.
An Entity undergoes some change (the Event) that is (or is construed as) punctual.
This frame concerns Acts and State_of_
This Frame is concerned with evaluating an Evaluee as being suitable for a Purpose or a User, presupposing some choice that is being made about which Evaluee to use for the Purpose or User.
frameExamples: This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
Why don't we <t>enforce</t> the 20000 gun laws currently on the books across the nation?
This book is very <t>relevant</t> to my essay.
This <t>happens</t> to me all the time.
A lot of people suspect that blocking savers' access to their money <t>violates</t> the new constitution's explicit ban on compulsory loans to the government.
(1) We need to build more houses <t>suitable</t> for local residents.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.
The <fen>Rule</fen> is the set of constrants on behavior that the <fen>Agent</fen> implements (i.e., forces others to obey or face consequences).
The <fen>Agent</fen>, often an institution, governmental organization, or arm thereof, puts into effect (i.e., enforces) a <fen>Rule</fen>.
This role describes the medium through which the rule was enforced.  It may occur in the same syntactic position as the Agent.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the Agent enforces the <fen>Rule</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Rule</fen> is or is not enforced.
Something that is profiled in the mind of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> as being related to mental <fen>Endeavor</fen>s.
A cognitive action (eg discussion, decision) performed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is connected in some way.
A participant in the mental <fen>Endeavor</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is related. This frame element is often null-instantiated and may be inferred from the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
This role identifies the event which occurs and affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
This role identifies where the event takes place.
The <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s behavior is in or out of compliance with norms.
This role identifies the <fen>Act</fen> that is judged to be in or out of compliance with the <fen>Norm</fen>s.
A <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> may violate a law or rule.
This role identifies the rules or <fen>Norm</fen>s that ought to guide a person's behavior.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen>  when the act of compliance or non-compliance occurs.
This Frame Element marks constituents expressing the entity that is judged to be more or less suitable for some <fen>Purpose</fen> or <fen>User</fen>.
This Frame Element marks constituents that express the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged to be suitable or unsuitable.
This role marks expressions that indicate a <fen>User</fen> to whom
listRoleExamples: Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.
Employers should strictly enforce <fex>a prohibition against use of any substance that may affect a worker's physical or mental ability</fex>.
Can <fex>a landlord</fex> enforce rules upon tenants?
The rules will be enforced <fex>by a new computer system that tracks people's movements</fex>.
That particular regulation was only enforced <fex>in 1920</fex>.
For this reason they enforced the settlement system <fex>in America</fex> just as strictly as in Germany.
Jo's <fex><t>violation</t></fex> of the no trespassing law came as a surprise.
John violated <fex>the law</fex> by not paying taxes.
Being a project leader is not a job for which <fex>everybody</fex> is suited.
We need to plan more buildings suitable <fex>for disabled people</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee
the Departments of Education and Justice
